data.name: Standard Variable Rate - Home Package Plus Special Offers for First Home Buyers
data.description: Special Offer discounts for First Home Buyers on Standard Variable rates in your Home Package Plus with New or additional lending of > $150,000

features.additionalInfo: Redraw additional repayments as cashback, with no cashback fee and unlimited withdrawals
The choice of Interest Only repayments for a maximum period of five years and subject to you satisfying applicable bank criteria
Ability to add additional funds. An additional Loan is available (subject to satisfying our credit requirements) and fees and conditions may also apply
Ability to set up automated repayments
Split your loans in the package to include Variable and Fixed Rate loan/s at no additional cost
No Annual Fee - The Home Package Plus fee is waived for the life of the loan for First Home Buyers
Pay no Annual Card fee on new Suncorp Bank Platinum, Gold or Standard Credit Cards
Receive a discount of up to 20% off the first year's annual premium on Suncorp Home, Landlord and Content insurance policies
Receive a discount of up to 10% off the first years annual premium on new to Suncorp Motor insurance policies
A discounted interest rate when you combined total home lending over $150,000 with an Everyday Options Account

eligibility.additionalInfo: Home Loans provided to approved applicants only. Credit and lending criteria applies and is subject to change without notice
Home Package Plus - New Home Lending of $150,000 +
First Home Buyers - Applicable for Owner Occupied First Home Buyers who qualify within their state as first home buyers.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The first valuation assessment for each loan application is provided by the Bank. If any additional valuation assessments that involve a physical inspection are obtained by us for assessing the loan security, than this fee will apply.

fees.name: Excess Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: You can request 4 bank cheques for free. An extra 5 free bank cheques are available for progress payments on construction loans. After you have used the free cheques, a fee is payable for each bank cheque requested.

fees.name: Guarantor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if a guarantor is included in the loan. Fee is per guarantor.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Default Interest
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Loan Finalisation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a loan is paid out in full, This includes settlements, refinances and payouts.

fees.name: Progressive Funding Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies at loan settlement or first draw (at the Bank's discretion) for any part of the loan provided for construction purposes.

fees.name: Copy of Documents Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we are required to obtain a copy of a document, including Mortgage or title search.

fees.name: Home Package Plus Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Home Package Plus Annual Fee is waived for First Home Buyers for the life of the loan

lendingRates.additionalInfo: First Home Buyer with New home lending of > $150,000
